name: Star Trek: Starfleet Command Volume 2 - Empires at War
name_original: Star Trek: Starfleet Command Volume 2 - Empires at War
description:
Star Trek: Starfleet Command Volume 2 - Empires at War is a strategy game developed by Taldren and 14 Degrees East. It came out on 01-01-2000. It was published by Interplay Productions.
You can play Star Trek: Starfleet Command Volume 2 - Empires at War on PC.
